function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Realtime monitoring of IAQ parameters may introduce privacy concerns for building occupants.","Impact":"Loss of trust and privacy for building occupants, potential legal implications for privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Implement data anonymization and encryption, provide clear consent and transparency to building occupants.","Technologies":"Data anonymization, encryption, IoT security protocols.","People":"Building occupants, privacy advocates, legal authorities.","Owner":"Building management, IoT solution providers."},{"Description":"Dependence on IoT for realtime monitoring may lead to system failures, causing hazardous conditions to go undetected.","Impact":"Potential health risks for building occupants, damage to property and infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Implement backup systems, regular maintenance and testing of IoT devices, and automated alerts for system failures.","Technologies":"Redundant IoT systems, predictive maintenance algorithms, automated alert systems.","People":"Building occupants, building management, maintenance and IT staff.","Owner":"Building management, IoT solution providers."},{"Description":"Greater interaction with the physical world through IoT increases the risk of cyber attacks and unauthorized access to IAQ monitoring systems.","Impact":"Compromised data integrity, potential disruption of IAQ monitoring, and safety risks for building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement strong cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and employee training on cybersecurity best practices.","Technologies":"Firewalls, intrusion detection systems, encryption, employee training programs.","People":"IT staff, cybersecurity experts, building management, IoT solution providers.","Owner":"Building management, IoT solution providers."}]}
